/** Tool to extract samples from an Avro data file. */
"maximum number of records in the outputfile"
"rate at which records will be collected"
"samplerate has to be a number between 0 and 1"
// if this is the first file, the schema gets saved
// subsequent files have to have equal schemas
/**skips a number of records from the input*/

/** writes records with the given samplerate
   * The record at position offset is guaranteed to be taken*/
"extracts records from a list of input files into a new file."
"--limit       maximum number of records in the output file."
"--samplerate  rate at which records will be collected"
"A dash ('-') can be given to direct output to stdout"
